lang.ENTER_HELP_TEXT: Describe what you are having problem with...
lang.ALERT_STEP_SUCCESS: The step is done perfectly! Go to the next one.
lang.ALERT_STEP_FAIL: Unfortunately the step is failed. Go to the next one.
lang.END_ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure you want to end trainer execution?
lang.INSTRUCTION1: 1. In the simulator, you must click the appropriate command icons (interface buttons, highlighted in blue) to create primitives in the order used to create them, unless otherwise specified in the instructions for a particular step.
lang.INSTRUCTION2: 2. If the icon is pressed correctly - it is highlighted in green, if incorrect - red.
lang.INSTRUCTION3: 3. At some stages of the step you need to enter certain data in the text fields (fields that are intended for input are empty).
lang.INSTRUCTION4: 4. At each step you have two attempts - if the wrong icon is pressed twice, the step is not counted and you should go to the next step of the simulator.
lang.STEP1_TASK: Task: Use the mouse to select the object (in Perspective window) corresponding to your variant.
lang.STEP2_TASK: Task: Move the Box object to a point with the specified coordinates according to your variant. To complete the task, select the appropriate command on the Main Toolbar. Select the object to move, then in the Transform Type-In area in the appropriate fields, enter the values of the coordinates of the point X, Y, Z.
lang.STEP3_TASK: Task: Create a group of objects. To complete the task, you must first select the objects by calling the Select by Name command on the Main Toolbar. In the opened window select objects to group and close the window. Then from the main menu select a command to group, agree with the proposed name and complete the command.
lang.STEP4_TASK: Task: Align the objects according to the option specified in the table. To complete the task, specify the correct item in the main menu, select the appropriate submenus and commands, specify the alignment object, then in the dialog box that opens, specify the alignment option and click the button to complete the command.
